00047 string EGS_IPlanes::type = "EGS_IPlanes";
00048 string EGS_RadialRepeater::type = "EGS_RadialRepeater";
00049 
00050 EGS_IPlanes::EGS_IPlanes(const EGS_Vector &Xo, const EGS_Vector &A, int np,
00051                          const EGS_Float *angles, const string &Name, bool degree) :
00052     EGS_BaseGeometry(Name), xo(Xo), axis(A) {
00053     nreg = 2*np;
00054     a = new EGS_Vector[nreg];
00055     d = new EGS_Float[nreg];
00056     int j;
00057     EGS_Float phi180 = M_PI;
00058     if (degree) {
00059         phi180 = 180;
00060     }
00061     EGS_RotationMatrix R(axis);
00062     for (j=0; j<nreg; j++) {
00063         EGS_Float phi;
00064         if (j < np) {
00065             phi = angles[j];
00066         }
00067         else {
00068             phi = angles[j-np] + phi180;
00069         }
00070         if (degree) {
00071             phi *= (M_PI/180);
00072         }
00073         EGS_Float cphi = cos(phi), sphi = sin(phi);
00074         a[j] = EGS_Vector(-sphi,cphi,0)*R;
00075         d[j] = a[j]*xo;
00076     }
00077 }
00078 
00079 EGS_IPlanes::EGS_IPlanes(const EGS_Vector &Xo, const EGS_Vector &A,
00080                          int np, const EGS_Vector *aj, const EGS_Float *dj,
00081                          const string &Name) : EGS_BaseGeometry(Name), xo(Xo), axis(A) {
00082     nreg = np;
00083     a = new EGS_Vector[nreg];
00084     d = new EGS_Float[nreg];
00085     int j;
00086     for (j=0; j<nreg; j++) {
00087         a[j] = aj[j];
00088         d[j] = dj[j];
00089     }
00090 }
00091 
00092 EGS_IPlanes::EGS_IPlanes(const EGS_Vector &Xo, const EGS_Vector &A,
00093                          int np, EGS_Float first, const string &Name) :
00094     EGS_BaseGeometry(Name), xo(Xo), axis(A) {
00095     nreg = np;
00096     EGS_Float dphi = 2*M_PI/nreg;
00097     EGS_RotationMatrix R(axis);
00098     a = new EGS_Vector[nreg];
00099     d = new EGS_Float[nreg];
00100     for (int j=0; j<nreg; j++) {
00101         EGS_Float phi = first + dphi*j;
00102         EGS_Float cphi = cos(phi), sphi = sin(phi);
00103         a[j] = EGS_Vector(-sphi,cphi,0)*R;
00104         d[j] = a[j]*xo;
00105     }
00106 }
00107 
00108 EGS_IPlanes::~EGS_IPlanes() {
00109     delete [] a;
00110     delete [] d;
00111 }
00112 
00113 int EGS_IPlanes::isWhere(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00114     EGS_Float aux_old = a[0]*x;
00115     for (int j=1; j<nreg; j++) {
00116         EGS_Float aux = a[j]*x;
00117         if (aux_old >= d[j-1] && aux < d[j]) {
00118             return j-1;
00119         }
00120         aux_old = aux;
00121     }
00122     return nreg-1;
00123 }
00124 
00125 int EGS_IPlanes::inside(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00126     EGS_Float aux_old = a[0]*x;
00127     for (int j=1; j<nreg; j++) {
00128         EGS_Float aux = a[j]*x;
00129         if (aux_old >= d[j-1] && aux < d[j]) {
00130             return j-1;
00131         }
00132         aux_old = aux;
00133     }
00134     return nreg-1;
00135 }
00136 
00137 int EGS_IPlanes::howfar(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x,
00138                         const EGS_Vector &u, EGS_Float &t, int *newmed, EGS_Vector *normal) {
00139     if (ireg < 0) {
00140         egsFatal("EGS_IPlanes::howfar: ireg (%d) can not be negative\n",ireg);
00141     }
00142     EGS_Float t1 = t, t2 = t;
00143     EGS_Float up = a[ireg]*u;
00144     int inew = ireg;
00145     if (up < 0) {
00146         t1 = (d[ireg] - a[ireg]*x)/up;
00147         if (t1 <= t) {
00148             t = t1;
00149             inew = ireg-1;
00150             if (inew < 0) {
00151                 inew = nreg-1;
00152             }
00153             if (newmed) {
00154                 *newmed = medium(inew);
00155             }
00156             if (normal) {
00157                 *normal = a[ireg];
00158             }
00159         }
00160     }
00161     int j = ireg+1;
00162     if (j >= nreg) {
00163         j = 0;
00164     }
00165     up = a[j]*u;
00166     if (up > 0) {
00167         t2 = (d[j] - a[j]*x)/up;
00168         if (t2 < t) {
00169             t = t2;
00170             inew = j;
00171             if (newmed) {
00172                 *newmed = medium(inew);
00173             }
00174             if (normal) {
00175                 *normal = a[j]*(-1);
00176             }
00177         }
00178     }
00179     return inew;
00180 }
00181 
00182 EGS_Float EGS_IPlanes::hownear(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x) {
00183     if (ireg < 0) {
00184         egsFatal("EGS_IPlanes::hownear: ireg (%d) can not be negative\n",ireg);
00185     }
00186     EGS_Float t1 = a[ireg]*x - d[ireg];
00187     int j = ireg+1;
00188     if (j >= nreg) {
00189         j = 0;
00190     }
00191     EGS_Float t2 = d[j] - a[j]*x;
00192     return min(t1,t2);
00193 }

00195 void EGS_IPlanes::printInfo() const {
00196     EGS_BaseGeometry::printInfo();
00197     egsInformation("  axis: Xo = (%g,%g,%g) a = (%g,%g,%g)\n",xo.x,xo.y,xo.z,
00198                    axis.x,axis.y,axis.z);
00199     egsInformation(
00200         "\n=======================================================\n");
00201 }

00204 
00205 EGS_RadialRepeater::EGS_RadialRepeater(const EGS_Vector &Xo,
00206                                        const EGS_Vector &A, int np, EGS_BaseGeometry *G,
00207                                        EGS_Float first, const string &Name) : EGS_BaseGeometry(Name), g(G) {
00208     EGS_Float dphi = 2*M_PI/np;
00209     iplanes = new EGS_IPlanes(Xo,A,np,first-dphi/2);
00210     //iplanes = new EGS_IPlanes(Xo,A,np,first);
00211     //iplanes = new EGS_IPlanes(Xo,A,np,(EGS_Float)0);
00212     g->ref();
00213     iplanes->ref();
00214     nrep = np;
00215     ng = g->regions();
00216     nreg = nrep*ng + 1;
00217     //EGS_Float dphi = 2*M_PI/np;
00218     R = new EGS_RotationMatrix [nrep];
00219     EGS_RotationMatrix Ro(A);
00220     for (int j=0; j<nrep; j++) {
00221         //EGS_Float phi = first + dphi*(0.5+j);
00222         //EGS_Float phi = dphi*(0.5+j);
00223         EGS_Float phi = dphi*j;
00224         R[j] = Ro.inverse()*EGS_RotationMatrix::rotZ(-phi)*Ro;
00225     }
00226     phi_o = first;
00227     xo = Xo;
00228 }
00229 
00230 EGS_RadialRepeater::~EGS_RadialRepeater() {
00231     delete [] R;
00232     if (!iplanes->deref()) {
00233         delete iplanes;
00234     }
00235     if (!g->deref()) {
00236         delete g;
00237     }
00238 }
00239 
00240 void EGS_RadialRepeater::printInfo() const {
00241     EGS_BaseGeometry::printInfo();
00242     egsInformation("%d uniformely rotated replicas of geometry %s with "
00243                    "phi_o=%g degrees\n",nrep,g->getName().c_str(),
00244                    phi_o*180./M_PI);
00245     EGS_Vector xo(iplanes->getAxisXo()), axis(iplanes->getAxisDirection());
00246     egsInformation("Axis of rotation is xo=(%g,%g,%g) a=(%g,%g,%g)\n",
00247                    xo.x,xo.y,xo.z,axis.x,axis.y,axis.z);
00248     const char *med_name = getMediumName(med);
00249     if (med_name) {
00250         egsInformation("space is filled with %s\n",med_name);
00251     }
00252     else {
00253         egsInformation("space is filled with vacuum\n");
00254     }
00255     egsInformation("Repeated geometry:\n");
00256     g->printInfo();
00257 }

00259 extern "C" {
00260 
00261     EGS_IPLANES_EXPORT EGS_BaseGeometry *createGeometry(EGS_Input *input) {
00262         if (!input) {
00263             egsWarning("createGeometry(iplanes): null input?\n");
00264             return 0;
00265         }
00266         vector<EGS_Float> axis;
00267         EGS_Vector xo, a(0,0,1);
00268         int err = input->getInput("axis",axis);
00269         if (!err && axis.size() == 6) {
00270             xo = EGS_Vector(axis[0],axis[1],axis[2]);
00271             a = EGS_Vector(axis[3],axis[4],axis[5]);
00272             a.normalize();
00273         }
00274         else egsWarning("createGeometry(iplanes): wrong/missing axis input\n"
00275                             "  using Xo=(0,0,0), a=(0,0,1)\n");
00276         string type;
00277         err = input->getInput("type",type);
00278         if (!err && (type == "EGS_RadialRepeater" || type == "repeater")) {
00279             int np;
00280             err = input->getInput("number of repetitions",np);
00281             if (err || np < 2) {
00282                 egsWarning("createGeometry(iplanes): missing/wrong "
00283                            "'number of repetitions' input\n");
00284                 return 0;
00285             }
00286             string gname;
00287             err = input->getInput("repeated geometry",gname);
00288             if (err) {
00289                 egsWarning("createGeometry(iplanes): missing 'repeated geometry'"
00290                            " input\n");
00291                 return 0;
00292             }
00293             EGS_BaseGeometry *g = EGS_BaseGeometry::getGeometry(gname);
00294             if (!g) {
00295                 egsWarning("createGeometry(iplanes): no geometry named %s exists\n",
00296                            gname.c_str());
00297                 return 0;
00298             }
00299             EGS_Float phi_o = 0;
00300             EGS_Float tmp1,tmp2;
00301             err = input->getInput("first angle",tmp1);
00302             int err1 = input->getInput("first angle in radians",tmp2);
00303             if (!err) {
00304                 phi_o = tmp1*M_PI/180;
00305             }
00306             else if (!err1) {
00307                 phi_o = tmp2;
00308             }
00309             EGS_RadialRepeater *result = new EGS_RadialRepeater(xo,a,np,g,phi_o);
00310             result->setName(input);
00311             string medium;
00312             err = input->getInput("medium",medium);
00313             if (!err) {
00314                 result->setMedium(medium);
00315             }
00316             result->setRLabels(input);
00317             result->setLabels(input);
00318             return result;
00319         }
00320 
00321         vector<EGS_Float> angles;
00322         err = input->getInput("angles",angles);
00323         bool is_degree = true;
00324         EGS_Float max_angle = 180;
00325         if (err) {
00326             err = input->getInput("angles in radian",angles);
00327             if (err) {
00328                 egsWarning("createGeometry(iplanes): wrong/missing 'angles' or "
00329                            "'angles in radian' input\n");
00330                 return 0;
00331             }
00332             is_degree = false;
00333             max_angle = M_PI;
00334         }
00335         EGS_Float *ang = new EGS_Float [angles.size()];
00336         for (int j=0; j<angles.size(); j++) {
00337             ang[j] = angles[j];
00338             /*
00339             if( ang[j] < 0 || ang[j] > max_angle ) {
00340                 egsWarning("createGeometry(iplanes): angle must be between 0 and "
00341                     "%g\n",max_angle); delete [] ang; return 0;
00342             }
00343             */
00344             if (j > 0) {
00345                 if (ang[j] <= ang[j-1]) {
00346                     egsWarning("createGeometry(iplanes): angles must be ordered"
00347                                " in increasing order\n");
00348                     delete [] ang;
00349                     return 0;
00350                 }
00351             }
00352         }
00353         int nang = angles.size();
00354         EGS_Float ang_diff = ang[nang-1]-ang[0];
00355         if (ang_diff > max_angle) {
00356             egsWarning("createGeometry(iplanes): difference between first and last"
00357                        " angle must be less then 180 degrees.\n");
00358             if (is_degree)
00359                 egsWarning("  Your input: first angle=%g, last angle=%g,"
00360                            " difference=%g\n",ang[0],ang[nang-1],ang[nang-1]-ang[0]);
00361             else
00362                 egsWarning("  Your input: first angle=%g, last angle=%g,"
00363                            " difference=%g\n",ang[0]*180/M_PI,ang[nang-1]*180/M_PI,
00364                            (ang[nang-1]-ang[0])*180/M_PI);
00365             delete [] ang;
00366             return 0;
00367         }
00368         EGS_BaseGeometry *g = new EGS_IPlanes(xo,a,angles.size(),ang,"",is_degree);
00369         delete [] ang;
00370         g->setName(input);
00371         g->setMedia(input);
00372         g->setLabels(input);
00373         return g;
00374     }

00376     void EGS_RadialRepeater::setRLabels(EGS_Input *input) {
00377 
00378         // radial repeater labels
00379         string inp;
00380         int err;
00381         err = input->getInput("set repeater label", inp);
00382         if (!err) {
00383             iplanes->setLabels(inp);
00384         }
00385     }

00387 
00388     void EGS_RadialRepeater::getLabelRegions(const string &str, vector<int> &regs) {
00389 
00390         vector<int> local_regs;
00391 
00392         // label in repeated geometry
00393         local_regs.clear();
00394         g->getLabelRegions(str, local_regs);
00395         for (int i=0; i<nrep; i++) {
00396             for (int r=0; r<local_regs.size(); r++) {
00397                 regs.push_back(ng*i + local_regs[r]);
00398             }
00399         }
00400 
00401         // labels defined in iplanes
00402         local_regs.clear();
00403         iplanes->getLabelRegions(str, local_regs);
00404         for (int i=0; i<local_regs.size(); i++) {
00405             for (int r=0; r<ng; r++) {
00406                 regs.push_back(ng*local_regs[i] + r);
00407             }
00408         }
00409 
00410         // label defined in self (repeater input block)
00411         EGS_BaseGeometry::getLabelRegions(str, regs);
00412 
00413     }
